the man said before departing.
""Good evening
column4:
Chris. Say hello to the wife for me.""
""I sure will. Thanks. Bye
column7: who returned the goodbye. It was 5:03 when Elliot rested the handset in its cradle."|Comrades in Miami: A Novel|José Latour

column1: 17:03|I looked down at the watch Trey had given me last Christmas
column2: the delicate gold links so real and solid
column3: and it seemed like someone else’s memory strapped to someone else’s shaking hand. It was 5:03 now. I was halfway to my house.|Mother May I|Joshilyn Jackson
